1411080.name: Fantasy Grounds - FG Regional Map Pack
1411080.description:
Let players explorer your world with regional maps created directly within Fantasy Grounds Unity. Use coastline tiles with an underlying background texture to quickly create a continent or island of your own and build upon this with hills, mountains, lakes and more. Add a nice frame around the map using the brush tool and the Circle or Rectangle drawing tools and add borders and trade routes.
Note: This pack requires Fantasy Grounds Unity.
This pack comes with all new art from Joshua Watmough to allow Gamemasters to create their own regional maps.
  • Use advanced brush techniques in Fantasy Grounds Unity to add rectangular or circular frames around your regional map
  • Use tiles featuring transparency to create a unique map
  • Use the paint tools to add hills, mountains, forest, lakes and other terrain
  • Use the paint tools to add borders between regions or to show trade routes and more
  • Add decorative scrollwork to bring your creation to life
Help Resources to Maximize use of this product:
  • Using the Asset Window
  • Creating Maps with the Brush Tool
  • Creating Maps with Tiles
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Joshua Watmough
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software
